body:
Hi,

Guys if anyone know what is happening to my internet please help me!
Like for 3 days ago my internet is lagging like the hell, and the lag is not normal, i tried to change the internet password, but that only makes it more laggy, so, im the unique person using the internet...
Sometimes i lag when a match starts, or when i joined to a lobby (like hypixel, mineplex, in some times avicus), when people charge a cannon, idk why :(!
I see my paquets and i got a random number, maybe 50, maybe 40, maybe 30, maybe 10, maybe 0, but, theyre not stable :/
And sometimes it looks like i disconnected from my red and 3 secs after it reconnect automatically!

I know that this is a forum game, but i need help, if you guys can help me i would be glad with you c:
Also i will try to call my internet provider company :/
If i cant solve this problem maybe i'll quite T_T

PD: Sorry 4 the bean english

title: Help Me, Internet Connection Problem!

replies.body: I dont think that people ddos me 24/7 ;/
replies.body_tagged: I dont think that people ddos me 24/7 ;/

replies.body: Try either contacting your internet service provider or get new internet. That's my best advice.
replies.body_tagged: Try either contacting your internet service provider or get new internet. That's my best advice.

replies.body: have u tried reseting your motem or router?
replies.body_tagged: have u tried reseting your motem or router?

replies.body:
lagging like the hell xd

Maybe your modum/router is overheating.
replies.body_tagged:
lagging like the hell xd

Maybe your modum/router is overheating.

replies.body: ;( i tried a lot of things, today i will call to my internet company, if it doesnt work just quitting ;x

replies.body: Don't quit D: I'm pretty sure you just need new internet

replies.body:
Hi veo, I've had the same problem recently.  No it's not a ddos attack. Get that out. 
Its 1.8 multiplayer bug, according to forums. it will eventually go away. 

Good luck!
